node.name: SpringSource Tool Suite (STS) Edition: MyEclipse for Spring
node.shortdescription:
MyEclipse for Spring - STS Edition

Developing Spring applications with STS? It's all about options.
Enhance your STS tool stack to:

  • Scaffold Adobe Flex, GWT and iPhone web UIs
  • Simplify annotation of Spring and JAX-WS components
  • Prime for deployment to Google App Engine
  • And moreâ€¦

MyEclipse for Spring: STS Edition plugs directly into SpringSource Tool Suite (STS) as a value-added option and provides the same set of advanced accelerators for Spring development found in the existing MyEclipse for Spring IDE solution, including:

  • Spring Project bootstrapping
  • Scaffolding for a variety of web UIs including Adobe Flex, GWT and iPhone web
  • Code assistants for annotation-based development
  • Customizable code generation
  • Google App Engine support

For STS users looking for an alternative to the Spring Roo generation technology, please visit our Tool Comparison to see how MyEclipse for Spring may meet your development needs.

STS Edition is available as a plug-in for STS 2.3.2 (Galileo) and STS 2.5 (Helios).
node.body:
MyEclipse for Spring - STS Edition

Developing Spring applications with STS? It's all about options.
Enhance your STS tool stack to:

  • Scaffold Adobe Flex, GWT and iPhone web UIs
  • Simplify annotation of Spring and JAX-WS components
  • Prime for deployment to Google App Engine
  • And moreâ€¦

MyEclipse for Spring: STS Edition plugs directly into SpringSource Tool Suite (STS) as a value-added option and provides the same set of advanced accelerators for Spring development found in the existing MyEclipse for Spring IDE solution, including:

  • Spring Project bootstrapping
  • Scaffolding for a variety of web UIs including Adobe Flex, GWT and iPhone web
  • Code assistants for annotation-based development
  • Customizable code generation
  • Google App Engine support

For STS users looking for an alternative to the Spring Roo generation technology, please visit our Tool Comparison to see how MyEclipse for Spring may meet your development needs.

STS Edition is available as a plug-in for STS 2.3.2 (Galileo) and STS 2.5 (Helios).
